com.redhat.rhn.manager
Class BaseManager

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.manager.BaseManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionManager, CertificateManager, ChannelManager, CobblerSnippetLister, ConfigurationManager, DownloadManager, EntitlementManager, ErrataManager, KickstartLister, KickstartManager, MigrationManager, MonitoringManager, OrgManager, PackageManager, ProfileManager, RepoLister, RhnSetManager, SatManager, SessionManager, SolarisManager, SolarisPatchSetManager, SsmOperationManager, SystemManager, UserManager
public abstract class BaseManager
extends java.lang.Object

BaseManager - Class that contains common functionality for our Lister/Manager classes. The most often used method is makeDataResult() that executes a DataSource (our XML sourced SQL query classes) query and formats it into a DataResult object used by our UI layer for viewing.

Method Detail

makeDataResult

protected static DataResult makeDataResult(java.util.Map queryParams,
                                           java.util.Map elabParams,
                                           PageControl pc,
                                           SelectMode m)
Returns a DataResult for the given SelectMode bounded by the values of the PageControl.

Parameters:
queryParams - Named parameters for the driving query.
elabParams - Named parameters for the elaboration query.
pc - Page Control boundary definition.
m - datasource SelectMode.
Returns:
resulting DataResult bounded by the values of the PageControl.

Parameters:
queryParams - Named parameters for the driving query.

lc - ListControl filtering definition
m - datasource SelectMode.

makeDataResultNoPagination

protected static DataResult makeDataResultNoPagination(java.util.Map queryParams,
                                                       java.util.Map elabParams,
                                                       SelectMode m)
Returns a DataResult for the given SelectMode with no bounds. This can be usefull if you want a list without pagination controls.

Parameters:
queryParams - Named parameters for the driving query.
elabParams - Named parameters for the elaboration query.
m - datasource SelectMode.
Returns:
resulting DataResult bounded by the values of the PageControl.

processPageControl

protected static DataResult processPageControl(DataResult dr,
                                               PageControl pc,
                                               java.util.Map elabParams)
Process the PageControl against the DataResult. Returns an unelaborated list if PageControl is null.

Parameters:
dr -
elabParams - Named parameters for the elaboration query.
pc - Page Control boundary definition.
Returns:
DataResult modified (filtered) by the PageControl

processListControl

protected static DataResult processListControl(DataResult dr,
                                               ListControl lc,
                                               java.util.Map elabParams)
Process the ListControl against the DataResult. The method does not limit the number of results, unlike PageControl, and simply provides filtering. Returns an unelaborated list if ListControl is null.

Parameters:
dr -
elabParams - Named parameters for the elaboration query.
lc - ListControl filtering definition.
Returns:
DataResult modified (filtered) by the PageControl
